title: Vayne Rework?

embed.description: doublelift pls, side note: league of legends is the best game ever

body: Does anyone know when Vayne is getting a rework for viability? I feel like she is so weak in the meta.

replies.body: vayne weak in a tank meta? wtf are you on?

Champion not picked != Rework.

Second before claiming that she is unplayable and then editting your post, you should at least check her proper viability.

Vayne just needs a few QoL. thats all. she is near being played. Right now pretty much all the ADCs are close to one another.

Did you just even watched the whole video. Doublelift picks her right after...
All I'm saying is that she is not meta, I never claimed she is unplayable.

Tanks have come back into the scene, particularly in the jungle

This is basically a wet dream for Vayne.

> [{quoted}](name=Bdoom,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2FdxTAkb,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-04-12T22:43:16.826+0000)
>
> All I'm saying is that she is not meta, I never claimed she is unplayable.

cute, editing the thread just so you can lie... so sad

unplayable... sorry but Vayne doesn't need a rework and isn't unplayable. Learn to use her effectively and watch her melt anything. Vayne is just like Kog in which she needs a team that can protect her
Unless you're Piglet. Then you just need to be fed.

> [{quoted}](name=Bdoom,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2FdxTAkb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-12T22:37:29.509+0000)
>
> Sounds like just your opinion.

you mean like this thread is just your opinion? =O
